RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT CUST_CAT,CUST_CAT_DESC FROM STTMS_CUSTOMER_CAT WHERE AUTH_STAT ='A' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y'
SELECT CLASS_CODE,CLASS_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTMS_CLASS WHERE CLASS_TYPE = 'CR' AND MODULE = ? AND RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y'
SELECT CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_CATEGORY, SHORT_NAME FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y'
